system.description: Effect: The user and all allied creatures with the Abiliies Plus or Minus increase their DEF and SPDEF stages by +1 for 5 activations (doubled for creatures with both), and those with with the Abiliies Anionic or Cationic increase their ATK and SPATK stages by +1 for 5 activations (doubled for creatures with both).

actions.name: Magnetic Flux
actions.description: Effect: The user and all allied creatures with the Abiliies Plus or Minus increase their DEF and SPDEF stages by +1 for 5 activations (doubled for creatures with both), and those with with the Abiliies Anionic or Cationic increase their ATK and SPATK stages by +1 for 5 activations (doubled for creatures with both).
